overview: Last Fall STUDIO 2000 packed its gear and, along with key members of its production staff headed east to that great big town on that great big lake in the heart of the Midwest --- Chicago--where with today's No. 1 rising young gay adult superstar, Sonny Markham, we produced what is our most superior celebration of male sexuality to date--In Man's Country. Up on Chicago's North Side, not far from Lake Michigan, is one of American's last great bath houses--Man's Country. Harkening back to those memorable palaces where the likes of Bette Midler could hold center stage one night only to be followed the next by the naughtiest and most outrageous celebrations of the downest and dirtiest sex imaginable, Man's Country is three floors of affirmation that post-Plague safe sex can bring people together for great nights of entertainment, play and, oh, yes, the very best that men can offer one another sexually--and that safe can be just the best there is.
title: In Man's Country
